entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Change how the helix tests work with the framework package in CI #42845
  • I'm stuck in "Interact with data in Blazor web apps" learning path. #42844
  • Reenable the `Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.Run.Tests.GivenDotnetRunBuildsCsproj.ItDefaultsToTheFirstUsableLaunchProfile` test #42841
  • `dotnet restore -v:n` doesn't show the log #42835

Closed

  • dotnet build/restore/run is not working #42831
  • NuGetAuditSuppress is ignored by dotnet list package #42832
  • [iOS] Net 9 Preview 7, iOS app in Release will crash when UseInterpreter is set to true #42752
  • CopyDocumentationFilesFromPackages behave different in docker #42825

PullRequests

Created

  • re-enable the framework hosted compiler test #42843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #42837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add RemoveJsonPropertyPostAction for symmetry with AddJsonPropertyPos… #42836
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove locale from diagnostic-ids link #42830
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

Merged

  • Fix the cppcli tests by upgrading to preview 7 in stage 0 #42822
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-enable a torn SDK test #42829
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.4xx #42701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc1] .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-preview.7.24407.1 August 2024 Updates #42834
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Backport of auditSources fix #42826
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create Pipe Server per Test Application in dotnet test #42785
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Revert "Replace obsolete nuget api in Microsoft.DotNet.PackageValidation" #42648
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Fix GetTargetPath hook point #42812
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc1] Fix the cppcli tests by upgrading to preview 7 in stage 0 #42823
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Remove the install of all runtimes 5.0 and below. #42327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the loc build to target 9.0.1xx #42746
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Alpha Branding #42743
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools
  • Temporary fix for the cppcli tests #42811
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Extend `dotnet run` to invoke a run-command-producing Target #42240
  • Permit workload restore to work with new global.json #42606
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Send "workload set not installed" messages #42683
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Enable 9.0.1xx branch for SDKDiffTests and LicenseScanTest #42784
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Backport of auditSources fix #42800
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Enable tab-completion for nuget package versions #42777
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42736
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #42807
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42739
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
